column4: Hey guys, i hope it is ok to ask this here... sorry if it's not... i don't really know where else to ask :P I wish to distribute a program that i developed under the gpl license.. does this mean that i have to get a copyright first?? i'm no good at this legal stuff :P??
raven: Thanx :D i was hoping for that XD
lmao, thanx 4 the help guys XD
Yep.  Just put "Copyright yournamehere 2008 Released under the GPL" at the top and you are OK.  There is a longer form that's better, but that alone is good enough for most purposes.
